attributes.action: Give Captain Tom Moore a knighthood
attributes.additional_details: Captain Tom Moore has raised more than £13,000,000 for the NHS by being brave and resolute.  Please confer a knighthood to this wonderful old soldier
attributes.background: Captain Tom Moore has raised more than £13,000,000 for the NHS by being brave and resolute.  Please confer a knighthood to this wonderful old soldier

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
